description: This is the main frontend component for a Tic Tac Toe game, managing game state, rendering UI components, and handling user interactions including game reset, undo, and persistence.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React component for Tic Tac Toe game, handling state, effects, and rendering child components.

methods.name: handlePress
methods.description: Handles user pressing on a cell, updating game state if move is valid.

methods.name: handleReset
methods.description: Resets the game to an empty board.

methods.name: handleNewGame
methods.description: Starts a new game, clearing history and removing persisted state.

methods.name: handleUndo
methods.description: Reverts to previous game state if possible.
